entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
